sys_hub_action_instance.comment: assign it to the manager of the said grp
progress = open
assign the request back to school body
when vendor updates the dispatch date
progress = Delivered
approval state changes to approved
when the government personal reviews and submits the form
assign it to government body manager for approval and approval state changes to requested
waiting for government personel to assign themself the request
assign the request to a vendor
progress = Out for delivery
change the progress to requested
progress changes to review
assign it to the manager of the said grp
approval state changes to reject
when vendor updates the delivery date
wait for the government manager to write rejection comments

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If the government manager rejects the request
the flow stops here as the number of goods n services requested are zero
check if total number of goods is not zero

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: assign it to the manager of the said grp
assign the request to a vendor
when vendor updates the delivery date
progress = Delivered
change the progress to requested
wait for the government manager to write rejection comments
assign the request back to school body
approval state changes to approved
when vendor updates the dispatch date
progress = Out for delivery
when the government personal reviews and submits the form
assign it to government body manager for approval and approval state changes to requested
assign it to the manager of the said grp
progress = open
approval state changes to reject
waiting for government personel to assign themself the request
progress changes to review

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If the government manager rejects the request
check if total number of goods is not zero
the flow stops here as the number of goods n services requested are zero
